thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-HPE Says Selected By U.S. Department of Defense To Provide New Supercomputers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HPE Says Selected By U.S. Department of Defense To Provide New Supercomputers

organizations.name: u.s. department of defense to provide new supercomputers feb

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co:
* HPE HELPS U.S. DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE TO ADVANCE NATIONAL DEFENSE CAPABILITIES
* HEWLETT PACKARD ENTERPRISE CO SAYS BEEN SELECTED BY U.S. DOD TO PROVIDE NEW SUPERCOMPUTERS FOR DOD HIGH PERFORMANCE COMPUTING MODERNIZATION PROGRAM
* HEWLETT PACKARD ENTERPRISE - UNDER THE U.S. DOD CONTRACT, CO WILL DELIVER CERTAIN SYSTEMS AND SERVICES AT A COMBINED TOTAL CONTRACT VALUE OF $57 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
